sub_topic: Synthesis of ibuprofen from 2-methylpropylbenzene and carbon dioxide
message_1: Calculate the yield of ibuprofen obtained from the given starting materials (2-methylpropylbenzene and carbon dioxide) during the synthesis process.
message_2: To calculate the yield of ibuprofen, we need to know the amount of starting materials used, the stoichiometry of the reaction, and the amount of ibuprofen produced. Please provide this information so that I can help you calculate the yield.
